name: Joe Picard
text: Called in order and was told 25 to 30 minutes. Waited 30 minutes and went to location. Got to window and was told they were running behind and would be a few more minutes. Watched pizza after pizza being loaded for take out orders but none …More

name: Monica Garcia
text: Best Pizza I think I’ve ever had & such a sweet Delivery Driver!

name: Jay Man
text: This is really a criticism for all Pizza Huts. A few years ago most Pizza Huts Across the Nation started under cooking the pizzas. I'm guessing maybe to save time so they can get the pizzas out quicker but I'm tired of it. Only time you should have an undercooked Pizza is when you ask for it to be undercooked

name: Anthony Lewis
text: I've had mostly bad services here. The place is constantly under new management, employees are ever changing, and the pizza is almost never done right. Just two nights ago a quarter of our pizza was just dough/crust. I mean how do you miss …More

name: Brian Brammer
text: Pizza looked great at first, but we soon realized the toppings were not cooked all the way!  Really not a fan of eating raw onion.  Really upset that I paid for this and only ate half of it.  Staff didn't really care that I was there, got a "Hey" from the cook.

name: Shoonu Lacey
text: Assistant Manager, Michelle, was so friendly. Very pleasant lady!  Should be made a manager!

name: Morgan Adams
text: Ordered here many times until one day I got my pizza uncut. And just this morning having a little road snack down to my destination I get a hair in my pizza.

name: SaDonna Rogers
text: This location is severely lacking in customer service.  I placed an order for delivery as I’ve done at least two other times in the past.  After waiting an hour I got a call saying they didn’t have my apartment number on my online order …More

name: Lynda
text: Don't really have anything bad to say about this Pizza Hut. We only do call in and pick up and haven't been disappointed. The few times they made a mistake on our order... And that's in over 25 years!... They've rectified it quickly. Since …More

name: Chellen Key
text: Great people

name: Sonjay Sidhu
text: Hot,fresh and delicious pizza. Pizzas were ready in less than 20 min. Pizza had amazing flavor and werw perfect

name: Bri Nicole
text: Every time we have paid extra for the specialty crust (garlic buttery blend, Parmesan, etc), we never got it! Not a huge deal since it’s just a crust flavour but it’s slightly annoying after the 5th time. When we asked if the P’zone could …More

text: They recently completely remodelled the place, and I think it is a complete turnaround point. It's cleaner and younger looking - a drastic improvement. Food's good too.

text: Cuz Z the handsome works their

text: New looking updated pizza hut very comfortable, decor very modern, great pizza buffet for weekday lunch, good salad bar and pizza selection.

name: James Crum
text: Good place to eat. Very clean and good prices.

name: Chris Tipton
text: This place has dissapointed me three times now. Paid extra for pan on 2 pizzas and got hand tossed. Tried the buffet a few weeks ago and I would rather go to Cici's. This was after the re-model. The quality before that was what drove me to …More

name: Crystal Rush
text: Pizza Hut in Burkburnett is a win some lose some location to eat at and for delivery. Carry out is normally really good though. However, there's been times I feel I've gotten my money's worth and time I haven't. The ingredients are great it …More

name: leota helton
text: One of my pizzas and breadsticks were burnt not even cheesy was hard and brown. But my other pizza was fine. Not sure why the other two were way over cooked. Sorry to say I'll …More

name: Coleen Hill
text: Not sure what happened tonight but ordered a stuffed crust pizza with extra cheese mushrooms and onions..we did not get extra cheese nor any mushrooms or onions..pizza was very thin and the crust was over compasting for the rest of our …More

name: Makayla May
text: If I could give 0 stars I would!  I ordered online, waited 10 minutes after it said it would be ready before getting there. There were 6 people ahead of me. All waiting for their food. When it was finally my turn in line, there were 6 more …More

name: Mark Vaughn
text: Brand new building is nice. Pizza is always good from this location. If there ever is a mistake management is good about making it right.

name: Cindy Jacks
text: I LOVE Pizza Hut pizza. The people are friendly and very helpful. Every time I've been it's been clean and well maintained .

name: Alante Donovan
text: Every time I order in or out, it's the best pizza experience in town!

name: KJ Glenn
text: I tried to order and they hung up on us twice, pizza was fairly good though

name: Emily Adams
text: The second pizza we got was wrong and we were told they would redo it for us. Six of us were finished eating and the last person still had not gotten that pizza. I asked about it once and was told it was coming. It never did. Luckily we …More

name: Seth Y.
text: The place was fine, not sure if it was just someone not used to the register, but the guy had some issues with gettinge taken care of. The pizza was great though.

name: Karen Cavender
text: Their pizza is always cooked just the way we ask for it. We have been going to this Pizza Hut for over a year and I wouldn't go to another. Their service is above and beyond! Love them!

text: Very clean inside.Nice and cool in lobby area, tables were set with silverware. Employees are super friendly and have a very happy demenor.

text: No fresh pizza on buffet during entire hour that we were there. No one came and checked on us. No refills offered. No plates cleared from the table. When paying our bill, I asked if we got charged for just salad bars, since that's all that …More
